p: Although the monoterpenes hydrocarbons remained the most abundant family, followed by oxygenated monoterpenes (reflecting the results reported in the literature [20]), the characteristic absence of oxygenated sesquiterpenes and the very low presence of non-oxygenated sesquiterpenes, makes the essential oil of Bronte pistachio hulls easily recognized and distinguishable from essential oils derived from other pistachio hull varieties.
